feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • "Grid" drag and drop layouts by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14360
  • Tiny fix for memo stores by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14419
  • Fix saving huge amounts of unnecessary data in settings by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14422
  • Bump elliptic from 6.5.4 to 6.5.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14420
  • Search logical operator fixes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14394
  • Fix query conditions on views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14423

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.8...2.31.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ensure autoscreens use a specific component order to look better on old clients by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14429

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.0...2.31.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change Automations CodeEditorModal to update on close by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14441

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.1...2.31.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update packages/pro refernce to latest master. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14465
  • Update packages/pro refernce to latest master. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14466
  • Refactor view usage by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14467
  • Update packages/pro refernce to latest master. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14469
  • Update packages/account-portal reference. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14471

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.2...2.31.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix #14408 - Delete Screen modal shows behind builder by @D-Lite in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14436
  • Trimming views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14468
  • Reduced the Modal z-index to 1001 by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14475
  • Use new feature flag API for SQS. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14386
  • Fix for force password reset by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14478
  • Update pro to latest master. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14480
  • Pro submodule check issue by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14487
  • The UI should indicate who the account holder is by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14470
  • Bump micromatch from 4.0.4 to 4.0.8 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14488
  • Bump micromatch from 4.0.5 to 4.0.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14489
  • Enable SQS by default in development by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14484
  • Make sure setEnrichedUsers is called when tenantOwnerLoaded by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14491
  • Poc authenticated iframe by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14411

New Contributors

  • @D-Lite made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14436

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.3...2.31.4
